column4: can I ask pc hardware related questions here, or is it strictly ubuntu only?
you know how people say certain old computers will only recognise a HDD up to a certain size, why is that, or is it all FUD?
I have a computer from 2002, running ubuntu server, and I want to know if I can put a 1TB hdd into it
It depends on the filesystem used. Older computer will generally have hard drives formatted with older, limited file systems.
